PERSONA:
sarah is a 35-year-old white, non-hispanic woman living in a non-metropolitan area in the middle atlantic region of the northeast united states. she is a high school graduate with no further formal education. sarah was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen.

sarah is a devout protestant christian who attends religious services more than once a week. she identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian and holds very conservative religious and political views. sarah is a registered republican voter and aligns herself with the conservative wing of the party.

sarah is married and comes from a middle-income household, earning between $70,000 and $80,000 annually. despite her modest educational background, she is an active internet user and is almost constantly online.

sarah is an engaged member of her community and regularly volunteers her time. she leads a traditional family-oriented lifestyle centered around her faith, conservative values, and community involvement. sarah takes pride in her roots in small-town america and embraces the traditional values and way of life common in non-metropolitan areas.
